TITLE.P: ByggHaugesund2020 — K902.05 Operating Tables for Delivery to Fonna Health Trust, Haugesund Hospital

SHORT_DESCR.P: The contracting authority would like tenders for operating tables (universal top with a fixed base), as well as transport trolleys for the universal top and various positioning equipment and associated trolleys.

Five Magnus (Maquet) system tables on a fixed base, 1 Magnus (Maquet) system table with a mobile base, and 1 Alphamaquet (Maquet) system table with a fixed base are to be moved from an existing building to the new department. In addition associated equipment and transport trolleys are to be moved.

A lot of emphasis will be put on the new operating tables ensuring good work flow and efficient patient treatment, at the same time that patient safety is maintained. Available storage areas must also be taken into consideration. In order to maintain patient safety, it must be possible to use the operating tables with associated equipment in a flexible way together with the equipment that has been moved, as well as across theatres and for different types of surgical interventions. If the offered equipment is not compatible with the existing equipment it will affect efficiency and flexibility in the department. Tenderers must, therefore, add 2 (two) extra tops in their tender in order to maintain the planned efficiency/flexibility in the surgical department.

Fixed base for operating table tops. Must have good height adjustment so that the surgeon can either sit or stand during various interventions without the base getting in the way of the operator's legs. Some of the bases must be priced as an option.
Universal top for the operating table, with a transport trolley (012.03.004).

For use in many types of interventions. The operating tables must allow easy access to the patient's operation area regardless of positioning. Trolleys for transporting universal tops with and without a patient must also be delivered.
An overview is wanted with prices of positioning equipment that can be offered.
This must be priced as an option.
Trolleys for storage and transport of various positioning equipment for various interventions.
This must be priced as an option.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: Base for the operating table (012.03.001) — some of the bases must be priced as an option.
Universal top for the operating table, with a transport trolley (012.03.004), which must be priced as an option.
Trolley for positioning equipment (012.03.023), which must be priced as an option.

SUITABILITY.P: Qualification requirement: requirements for tenderer's registration.
Documentation requirement: tenderers must present documentation of their legal registration in a company register or a trade register in the country where the tenderer is established.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Qualification requirement: tenderers must have sufficient economic and financial solidity to fulfil the contract obligations. Economic and financial capacity means that the tenderer fulfils the following requirements:
A credit rating of at least score A or higher, measured against the AAA Soliditets scale, or an equivalent score from another reputable rating company.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Documentation requirement: the contracting authority will evaluate the tenderer's compliance of the qualification requirement as follows: credit ratings.

If the tenderer has valid reasons for not being able to provide the documentation requested by the contracting authority, the tenderer can prove his economic and financial capacity with another document, including for example a parent company guarantee, bank guarantee, etc.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: See the attached contract in Mercell.
